price: Are your disbelievers [O Makkans] superior to those[15] or have you been granted immunity in divine Scriptures?
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
